column1: Table 4-107:  NOx, CO, and NMVOC Emissions from Industrial Processes and Product Use (kt)

column2: a Miscellaneous includes the following categories: catastrophic/accidental release, other combustion, health services, cooling towers, and fugitive dust.  It does not include agricultural fires or slash/prescribed burning, which are accounted for under the Field Burning of Agricultural Residues source.
b Includes rubber and plastics manufacturing, and other miscellaneous applications.
c Includes cutback asphalt, pesticide application adhesives, consumer solvents, and other miscellaneous applications.
Note: Totals may not sum due to independent rounding.
